betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You've never had real issues with your infusion altar spitting out Flux, but as you start to draw plans to speed up and, hopefully, automate it you can't help but worry. Too often is speed the enemy of stability, and automation introduces another potential point of failure.

The Shovel of the Purifier, while ostensibly designed for quickly excavating through various Taint-related blocks and gathering Tainted Shards in the process, also has the ability to clear flux in a small area at the cost of durability. You can weather that cost.

Hopefully you'll never need to use it, but if you do you'll be glad you were prepared.

§3You shouldn't have an infusion altar spit out flux at any point, but one mistake and a WA is all it takes to turn it into a flux lake. Flux Scrubber foci are good, but even enhanced to the gills, not §othat§r§3 good.
